abstract: New Hampshire Judge Larry M Smukler sentences former St Paul's School student Owen Labrie to year in prison and five years of probation for sexually assaulting younger student; Labrie will also be required to register as sex offender.
lead_paragraph: A jury rejected felony sexual assault charges against Mr. Labrie, but found him guilty on counts relating to her being under the age of legal consent.

headline.main: Owen Labrie Gets Year in Jail for St. Paul’s School Assault
headline.print_headline: Former Elite Boarding School Student Sentenced to a Year in Jail for Sexual Assault

snippet: A jury rejected felony sexual assault charges against Mr. Labrie, but found him guilty on counts relating to her being under the age of legal consent.
